subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma was picked to coach the United States men’s Olympic team in Sochi instead of the one-time front-runner John Tortorella.
snippet: Penguins Coach Dan Bylsma was picked to coach the United States men’s Olympic team in Sochi instead of the one-time front-runner John Tortorella.
